citate.text: [!] Keep in mind during fishing that different fish have lips of different “durability”. That’s why some fish species will get away more often than others
[!] The lowering of biting intensity when using different thickness in lines depends on the fish caution. Some species will ignore its factor but some will become more caution on seeing such line
[!] If the big fish bite a small hook the time duration when the fish can get away will be increased.
[!] The casting range of a ledger rig depends on the load weight and a rod test. The lighter is weight the farther and more accurate the casting will be
